content.prompt: The word "oozed" at the beginning serves to suggest both

choices.label: Katharine’s gradual perception of her family legacy and the growing presence of that legacy in her life
Katharine’s dawning awareness of her heritage and her increasing confidence in her own abilities
the illustriousness of Katharine’s recent ancestors and the humble beginnings of her ancestry
the universality of Katharine’s experience and the ultimate messiness of certain aspects of human nature

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
